                                           : : Sting : :

                 =
   A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending from the sky, up ahe=
ad, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Deemos.  He waits to s=
ee if they will see him and stop...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From:=
 RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 200=
2 10:31 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  : : Diesel : :

  Diesel pull=
s out, following the others towards their destination.
    ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
    From: Hollywood Narrator 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

    Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Message=
s


    Arrow transforms into a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime and s=
peeds towards the destination. Deems transforms into a mechanical vulture a=
nd flies along behind...

      ----- Original Message -----
      From: Ro=
boRick007
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Tuesday, August 13, =
2002 2:29 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

   =
   He smiled at his friends excitment.

      Diesel: Alright lets go get o=
ur ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing it!

      D=
iesel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

      Diesel: Roll out!

      H=
e drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the way.
